problem_text: If \angle R S T is a right angle, S U \perp R T, U V \perp S T, and m \angle R T S = 47, find m \angle T U V.
compact_text: If \angle RST is a right angle, SU \perp RT, UV \perp ST, and m \angle RTS = 47, find m \angle TUV.
annotat_text: If $\angle R S T$ is a right angle, $\overline{SU} \perp \overline{RT}$, $\overline{UV} \perp \overline{ST},$ and $m \angle RT S=47,$ find $m \angle TUV$
